Articles.Content:
Incase you didn't receive the message post your asteroid pictures!

Here are some of mine.

I haven't redirected it yet, but it is my first asteroid.

Notice how small the ship looks... (Yep, that's an E)

Edited April 2, 2014 by RocketPilot573
My first space rock. A friendly little class C asteroid that was on a collision course with Kerbin.

I've decided I'm going to use asteroids to construct a scale model of the solar system along the length of the runway.

This should be interesting...

Advanced grabber unit not there yet all other parts and asteroids are.

in sandbox it exists

I have asteroids

all other parts exist.

Yet in science mode it does not?

what research section is the grabber unit in? I have none open research items showing. So I assume I got it. Please help

Please help I want to try it out with a new ship that I just finished

-rex

hell yeah..... too bad i cant download it today.....

but for sure trying it tommorrow

Hi all, have somebody played the two new ARM scenarios?

I tried and I think the ships are not well designed, I can;t get to move them at all. There are no torque wheels and the RCS are minimum.

The sounds, the freaking sounds. Just... WHY.

Anyways, already catched an asteroid and it's orbiting Kerbin, going to get a bigger ship now that I require less deltaV, and drag it to a better orbit.

[h=2]Advanced grabber unit not there yet all other parts and asteroids are[/h]

in sandbox it exists

I have asteroids

all other parts exist.

Yet in science mode it does not?

what research section is the grabber unit in? I have none open research items showing. So I assume I got it. Please help

Please help I want to try it out with a new ship that I just finished

-rex
I JUST got this one. Took about 5 tries and I had to give up on a C-class impactor. Sorry to whoever was hit by that. (not a bad way to go out )
What someone, with more patience than I, should do. : Is dock several asteroids together to create a station/planet killing doomsday device.

well, we got these fantastic new giant parts, however, things like the new SRB are so long that the existing decouplers dont work well without a decent amount of struts. Since from what i hear the new unity update allows more contact points couda pretty please with pulverized Jeb on top give us some longer decouplers?

thanks,

Mike

I actually found one strut at the top and one at the bottom was enough to keep the new SRBs from wobbling. wouldn't really call that a lot.

I've decided I'm going to use asteroids to construct a scale model of the solar system along the length of the runway.

This should be interesting...

Hmmm, I dont think the asteroids vary in size enough to have both the sun and the smaller planets to scale.

However... you could construct one in space, using the Mun as the Sun, and asteroids as the planets.
I need to attach sepatrons to these new SRBs. They always seem to collide with my rocket stack. I think a new radial decoupler with more ejection force would be nice.

The RL Space Shuttle has two contact points for the SRBs, one at the top

(seen here)

And one at the bottom

Completely realistic that you would need to do the same in KSP.
Heh, it didn't take long for this to turn extremely funny.

I just installed another mod, and I saw all these weird parts in my parts list... I was thinking "These don't look right... these almost look like the parts that are coming with .24!" So I guess I've been playing for hours today and didn't get the update until I restarted. When did this happen?

Anyway, looking forward to it. Woohoo!
I pulled a NASA and put an asteroid into Lunar orbit!
Do command modules no longer have built-in SAS units? Either that or they were tweaked to be amazingly weak. Anyone else finding this? Maybe I'm doing something wrong.

Its solar sailer time! 4 kerbal Jool bus on a 24 min burn!

What I love about it as a mechanic is really having to carefully plan approach vectors and oberth burns to run outside of planetary shadows.

i think the buff is for 0.24 not 0.23.5

(i may be wrong tho'... havent unlock the ions yet..)
I just nearly lept from my chair! I was worried sick Id need a new save for asteroids to show up in my stuff, but praise JEBEDIAH they are in existing saves!!

Yeah they're def buffed. 2kn thrust, 4200 Isp, 8.729 E/s. I imagine people will complain they're op but as it was between ants and oscar b's and nuclear rockets there was really no purpose for them. Especially being so high on the tech tree I think making them useful really adds a nice dimension.
oh? I may have to give them another try. I had given up on them.
